div.head: 卒惡死
div.div: sudden [appearance of] death resulting from [being struck by] the malign

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: sudden [appearance of] death resulting from [being struck by] the malign

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with cu zhong e si 卒中惡死 , “sudden [appearance of] death resulting from being struck by the malign”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry shi 豕：心血，治卒惡 死，及痘瘡倒靨 , “The blood from its heart...cures sudden [appearance of] death resulting from [being struck by] the malign , as well as inverted moles”.
